description: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery Author: Craig Young, oscd.community, Georg Lauenstein. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate administration use but user must be check out
name: Recon Activity with NLTEST
query: (process.executable:*\\nltest.exe AND ((process.command_line:*\/server* AND process.command_line:*\/query*) OR process.command_line:(*\/dclist\:* OR *\/parentdomain* OR *\/domain_trusts* OR *\/trusted_domains* OR *\/user*)))
